skill.name: asset-creator
skill.description: Create visual assets (images, illustrations) using AI (OpenAI DALL-E).
skill.summary: Create visual assets (images, illustrations) using AI (OpenAI DALL-E).
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: The asset-creator skill is a legitimate image generation tool using OpenAI's DALL-E API. All static findings evaluated are false positives. The 'external_commands' patterns are documentation examples for running the script via npx tsx, not dynamic command execution. The 'env_access' patterns are standard secure credential handling via process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY. The 'filesystem' operations are confined to the public directory for saving generated images. The critical heuristic findings are false alarms triggered by documentation patterns, not actual malicious behavior.

content.user_title: Generate custom images with AI-powered DALL-E integration
content.value_statement: Stop searching for stock photos. Create unique, on-brand visuals instantly with AI image generation. This skill integrates DALL-E 3 to produce high-quality assets tailored to your exact specifications.
actual_capabilities: Create assets in minimalist, flat design style
Save images to organized public directory structure
Support for vivid and natural image styles
Automatic directory creation for asset organization
limitations: Requires valid OpenAI API key with DALL-E access

use_cases.title: Create hero section illustrations
use_cases.description: Generate custom hero images for landing pages that match your brand style.

use_cases.title: Design social media graphics
use_cases.description: Produce unique visuals for blog posts and campaigns without stock photo limits.

use_cases.title: Generate UI mockup assets
use_cases.description: Create placeholder images and illustrations for prototypes and wireframes.

prompt_templates.title: Basic image generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an image of a modern dashboard interface with charts, minimalist flat design, white background

prompt_templates.title: Marketing hero image
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a hero image showing people collaborating on laptops, corporate memphis style, tech blue colors

prompt_templates.title: Icon-style illustration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create minimalist icons representing security, speed, analytics, and collaboration, flat vector style

prompt_templates.title: Complex scene generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Design an isometric illustration of a modern office space with team members, clean aesthetic

output_examples.input: Modern coffee shop interior with people working on laptops
output: Features minimalist flat design with natural lighting
White background makes integration into web designs easy

output_examples.input: Tech conference banner with abstract network connections
output: Features abstract network nodes in tech blue palette
High-resolution output suitable for web and print
Natural style selected for realistic rendering

best_practices: Always specify white background for easy web integration
Include style keywords like minimalist, flat design, vector style
Use folder parameter to organize assets by project or category
anti_patterns: Avoid requesting transparent backgrounds - DALL-E outputs JPG/PNG with solid backgrounds
Do not generate multiple images in one prompt - create separate requests
Never use vague prompts without style specifications - results will be inconsistent

faq.question: What image formats does it support?
faq.answer: DALL-E 3 generates JPG images saved as PNG. True transparency is not available.

faq.question: Can I generate multiple images at once?
faq.answer: Currently supports single image generation per request. Run multiple commands for multiple assets.

faq.question: What resolution are the images?
faq.answer: All images are generated at 1024x1024 pixels in HD quality.

faq.question: Do I need a special OpenAI account?
faq.answer: Yes, you need an OpenAI API key with DALL-E access. Pay-per-use pricing applies.

faq.question: Can I use these images commercially?
faq.answer: OpenAI grants full usage rights for generated images, including commercial use.

faq.question: How do I style the images consistently?
faq.answer: Use style keywords and choose vivid or natural style parameter for consistent results.
